title: Product Lister for Google Store (Shopify)
job_overview:
$3.50/hour | Part-time (Start with 4 hours/day)

We are looking for a reliable and self-motivated virtual assistant to join our team and help manage our Google Store through Shopify. Your main tasks will include product research, uploading products to our Shopify store, and making sure the listings are optimized for Google Shopping.

Your Responsibilities:

Research trending and high-potential products

List and upload products to our Shopify store

Create attractive product images using Canva

Ensure product listings meet Google Shopping requirements

Communicate with our Google Store agent and implement feedback

Requirements:

Experience with Shopify (especially product listing)

Familiarity with Canva and the ability to design clean, eye-catching product images

Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently

Good English communication skills

Willingness to learn and grow with us over time

We will start with 4 hours of work per day. If you show strong performance, more hours can be added gradually. You’ll get guidance at the beginning, but we expect you to work independently after a few weeks.

How to Apply:
If you're interested, please reply with the word blue in your message. This helps us know you’ve read the full job post.
Also, include a short explanation of your experience with:

Shopify (especially product listing)

Canva (and how you’ve used it to create product images)

Your previous role(s) involving these tools

We look forward to working with someone who takes initiative and is ready to grow with us.

Sincerely, 

Otison & Zyiliene
